roleset.name: increase a cellular response to a molecular stimulus
roleset.note: UPREGULATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.

role.descr: thing upregulated (e.g. protein or another molecule)

example.name: upregulate-v: active use, with instrument
example.text: We found that TGF-� upregulates CD70 expression on effector Tm cells while it preferentially induces Foxp3 expression in naive T cells.
example.arg: CD70 expression on effector Tm cells

example.name: upregulate-v: with agent
example.text: For this purpose, we upregulated miR-639 and this treatment led to an approximately 2-fold augmentation in invasive properties (Figure 3A).

example.name: upregulation-n
example.text: Has anyone here ever heard of the upregulation of genes?
